Description: Kelsey Mitchell poured in 25 points and the Fever erupted with a 59-point second half to secure a 99-82 victory over Atlanta. Aliyah Boston contributed 19 points, 6 rebounds, and 8 assists, while Jordin Canada set a career high with 30 points and 6 three-pointers for the Dream. Indiana's defense held Atlanta without a field goal in the final quarter, turning the game around. Discover what fueled this explosive comeback and whatâ€™s next for these teams!
